_items.name: MAIN
_responsibilities: Start brodcasting packets, wait for connection from android
Initialize the GUI

_items.name: CLIENTLISTENER
_responsibilities: Listen for clients
Connect to clients upon request

_items.name: GUISTARTER
_responsibilities: Load up window
Open window
Hook into windows UI (Taskbar, Windows Live Tiles)

_items.name: NETWORKLISTENER
_responsibilities: Listen for UDP Packets from android
On recieving a packet, send a reply
Initalize connection to device
Listen for JSON data sent from client

_items.name: CLIENTCOMMUNICATOR
_responsibilities: Send Data to client
Recieve Data from client
Ping Client
Get Client Info

_items.name: TASKBARICONCREATOR
_responsibilities: creates background service to run in windows
creates taskbar icon with respective context menu

_items.name: NOTIFICATIONCREATOR
_responsibilities: Takes varibles from converted json and creates defaultnoti
Takes converted dataload icon and adds it to the noti
sends default notification to be displayed in gui

_items.name: NOTIFICATIONPROCESSOR
_responsibilities: Receive notification from client
Get notification type
Send to windows action center and GUI

_items.name: NOTIDISPLAY
_responsibilities: Creates drawable notification card from a defaultnoti object
Displays noti in gui
Displays noti as notification in windows

_items.name: JSONCONVERTER
_responsibilities: Converts Received JSON to different variables for notification
Converts Different Commands and Variables to JSON
Converts JSON from server, or converts JSON to be sent to server

_items.name: DEFAULTNOTIFICATION
_responsibilities: all the variables that make up a notification

_items.name: DATALOADCONVERTER
_responsibilities: Takes DataLoad (byte[]) recieved from client
Converts DataLoad to bitmap
Converts Bitmap to displayable format (png, icon, etc)

_items.name: WINDOWSNOTICREATOR
_responsibilities: creates windows notification from defaultnoti object
